title: Mark Cuban on the habit all 30-somethings need to succeed: Without it, 'you're not expanding your mind'
description: On Bill Maher's "Club Random" podcast, Mark Cuban said everyone over 30 should be reading every day.

title: This 29-year-old and her partner pay $1,000/month for a 3-bedroom apartment in San Juan, Puerto Rico
description: Valentina Valldejuli and her partner live in Hato Rey, the financial district in San Juan, Puerto Rico.

title: Harvard expert on the worst thing about New Year’s resolutions—and how to beat it: ‘A profound loss of energy’
description: Harvard's Lisa Lahey, an expert on our innate aversion to change, shares why so many New Year's resolutions are doomed to fail — and why that's OK.
